short_summary: Request for Proposal for Temporary Help Services

full_summary:
**Tender Notice Title**
National Defence—S450-123456/001/CFSG: Temporary Help Services against the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR)

**Notice Type**
Request for Proposal (RFP) against a Supply Arrangement (SA)

**Number of Proposals to be Received**
All eligible contractors under the Supply Arrangement (EN578-172870) will receive an addendum with the participation instructions as they are not to be sent a full solicitation document.

**Description of the Requirement**
The Department of National Defence (DND) requires Temporary Help Services to support [insert client names]. The bid is for a Special Advisor to be employed under the category 13.9, Special Advisor.

**Specific Security Requirements**
The level of security clearance required for this position is Top Secret.

**Participating Contractors**
Only the following contractors under the Supply Arrangement (EN578-172870) who are registered under the streams and categories specified have been invited to participate:

- ADRM Technology Consulting Group Corp.
- Altis Human Resources (Ottawa) Inc.
- Eagle Professional Resources Inc.
- etc.

**Timeline**
Notice publication date: 2023-08-29
Bid closing date: 2023-09-05 (10:00 am local time)
Contract start and end dates: None specified

**Bid Evaluation Criterion**
The lowest-priced proposal will be accepted.

**Trade Agreements**
This contract will be done in compliance with the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP) and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Location**
The proposed services will be delivered in the National Capital Region (NCR), Ottawa, ON K2H8G1, Canada.

**Bid Documents**
The proposals must be submitted via the online tendering system, available on the Buyandsell.gc.ca website, under the reference: s4538288-method-2---rfp-(english-version).

 
**Contact Information**

* For more information regarding this procurement, please contact:
CFSG(O-G) Temp Help
Temporary Help GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca
 Phone: (613) 971-7955
Address: 60 Moodie Drive, Ottawa, ON K2H8G1, Canada.
 
* Please do not contact the Service Desk for Tendering Information as the following information is considered as business sensitive information.
* As this tender is being completed on a**Bloc post + entsprechential
